Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to substantiate the assertion that injectable birth control makes women fat and prevents them from receiving "man meat" injections. Falters at times: The claim may be seen as faltering at times as it presents the statement as a direct quote from Steve Bannon, when in fact, it was a quote from an article published on Breitbart. This misrepresentation could be considered a bias in the claim.
